languages.text:
Под влиянием {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}негативных эффектов{/g} шансы вашего персонажа на выживание снижаются: он получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафы{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыкам{/g} или действиям и все так же может получать {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g} каждый ход.
Когда персонаж подвержен какому-то эффекту, рядом с его портретом появляется соответствующий значок.
Негативные эффекты бывают общие и уникальные. К общим негативным эффектам относятся: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}пси-подавление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживание{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}неспособность атаковать{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PsychosomaticTraumaEffect}психосоматическая травма{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывание{/g}.
Все остальные негативные эффекты считаются уникальными — они встречаются гораздо реже и, как правило, их могут накладывать особые противники или {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive penalties to characteristics, skills or actions.
When a character is subject to any effect, the corresponding icon appears next to their portrait — hover over this icon to find out the details of a particular effect.

traits.locale_text:
Под влиянием негативных эффектов шансы вашего персонажа на выживание снижаются: он получает штрафы к характеристикам, навыкам или действиям.
Когда персонаж подвержен какому-то эффекту, рядом с его портретом появляется соответствующий значок — наведите курсор на этот значок, чтобы узнать особенность конкретного эффекта.

Под влиянием негативных эффектов шансы вашего персонажа на выживание снижаются: он получает штрафы к характеристикам, навыкам или действиям.
Когда персонаж подвержен какому-то эффекту, рядом с его портретом появляется соответствующий значок — наведите курсор на этот значок, чтобы узнать особенность конкретного эффекта.

languages.text:
Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, or actions, and may also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When a character is subject to any effect, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique. Common negative effects include: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}, psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
All other negative effects are considered unique — they are not nearly as commonly encountered. These unique effects are generally applied by specific {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} of characters or enemies.
languages.original_text:
Под влиянием {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}негативных эффектов{/g} шансы вашего персонажа на выживание снижаются: он получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафы{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыкам{/g} или действиям и все так же может получать {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g} каждый ход.
Когда персонаж подвержен какому-то эффекту, рядом с его портретом появляется соответствующий значок.
Негативные эффекты бывают общие и уникальные. К общим негативным эффектам относятся: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}пси-подавление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживание{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}неспособность атаковать{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PsychosomaticTraumaEffect}психосоматическая травма{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывание{/g}.
Все остальные негативные эффекты считаются уникальными — они встречаются гораздо реже и, как правило, их могут накладывать особые противники или {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}.

When a character is subject to any effect, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.

Common negative effects include: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}, psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, or actions, and may also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When a character is subject to any effect, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique. Common negative effects include: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}, psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
All other negative effects are considered unique — they are not nearly as commonly encountered. These unique effects are generally applied by specific {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} of characters or enemies.

languages.text:
Unter dem Einfluss von negativen Effekten werden die Überlebenschancen deines Charakters verringert: Er erhält {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzüge{/g} auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} oder Aktionen, und erleidet möglicherweise bei jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g}.
Wenn ein Charakter von einem Effekt betroffen ist, erscheint ein entsprechendes Symbol neben seinem Porträt.
Es gibt zwei große Kategorien negativer Effekte: gewöhnliche und einzigartige. Zu den gewöhnlichen negativen Effekten zählen: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Psidämpfer{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Angriff unmöglich{/g}, Psychosomatisches {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g}.
Alle anderen negativen Effekte werden als einzigartig angesehen – sie sind nicht annähernd so häufig anzutreffen. Diese einzigartigen Effekte werden im Allgemeinen durch bestimmte {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} von Charakteren oder Feinden ausgelöst.
languages.original_text:
Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, or actions, and may also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When a character is subject to any effect, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique. Common negative effects include: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}, psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
All other negative effects are considered unique — they are not nearly as commonly encountered. These unique effects are generally applied by specific {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} of characters or enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Unter dem Einfluss von {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negativen Effekten{/g} werden die Überlebenschancen deines Charakters verringert: Er erhält {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzüge{/g} auf seine Eigenschaften, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} oder Aktionen.
Wenn ein Charakter von einem {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} betroffen ist, erscheint ein entsprechendes Symbol neben seinem Porträt.

languages.text:
Sous l'influence d'effets négatifs, les chances de survie de votre personnage sont réduites. Des {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalités{/g} sont appliquées à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}, à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} ou à ses actions, et il peut également subir des points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
Lorsqu'un personnage est frappé par un effet, l'icône correspondante apparaît en regard de son portrait.
Il existe deux grandes catégories d'effets négatifs : les effets communs et les effets uniques. Les effets négatifs communs incluent : {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Affaiblissement Psy{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Attaque impossible{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumatisme psychosomatique{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.
Tous les autres effets négatifs sont considérés comme uniques, ce qui signifie qu'ils sont bien moins fréquents. Ces effets uniques sont généralement appliqués par des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} propres à certains personnages ou ennemis.
languages.original_text:
Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, or actions, and may also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When a character is subject to any effect, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique. Common negative effects include: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}, psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
All other negative effects are considered unique — they are not nearly as commonly encountered. These unique effects are generally applied by specific {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} of characters or enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Sous l'influence d'{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effets négatifs{/g}, les chances de survie de votre personnage sont réduites. Des {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalités{/g} sont appliquées à ses caractéristiques, ses {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} ou ses actions.
Lorsqu'un personnage est soumis à un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g}, une icône correspondante s'affiche en regard de son portrait.

languages.text:
当角色受到负面效果影响时，角色在战斗中存活下来的几率会更低，他们的{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}与行动会承受各种各样的{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}效果，每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}还可能会额外承受{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。
当角色受到任何效果影响时，该角色的肖像旁边会出现相应图标。
负面效果分为两类：常规负面效果与独特负面效果。常规负面效果包括：{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}灵能抑制{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}无法攻击{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}精神创伤{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态。
所有其他负面效果都是独特效果，这些效果并不属于常规负面效果。独特负面效果通常由特定角色或敌人的特定{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}施加。
languages.original_text:
Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, or actions, and may also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When a character is subject to any effect, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique. Common negative effects include: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}, psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
All other negative effects are considered unique — they are not nearly as commonly encountered. These unique effects are generally applied by specific {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} of characters or enemies.

traits.locale_text:
在{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面效果{/g}的影响下，角色在战斗中存活下来的几率会更低，他们的属性、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}与行动会承受各种各样的{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}效果。
当角色受到任何{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}影响时，该角色的肖像旁边会出现相应图标。

languages.original_text:
Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive penalties to their characteristics, skills, or actions.
When a character is subject to any effect, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.

languages.text:
Cuando tus personajes sufren efectos negativos, sus probabilidades de supervivencia se reducen, ya que reciben {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalizaciones{/g} a sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} o acciones y posiblemente también {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
Cuando un personaje está sujeto a cualquier efecto, aparece el icono correspondiente junto a su retrato.
Hay dos categorías generales de efectos negativos: comunes y únicos. Los efectos negativos comunes incluyen: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}amortiguación psíquica{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}no puede atacar{/g}, traumatismo psicosomático y {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}.
Los demás efectos negativos se consideran únicos, al estar mucho menos extendidos. Estos efectos únicos los suelen aplicar las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} concretas de algunos personajes o enemigos.{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}{/g}
languages.original_text:
Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, or actions, and may also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When a character is subject to any effect, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique. Common negative effects include: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}, psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
All other negative effects are considered unique — they are not nearly as commonly encountered. These unique effects are generally applied by specific {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} of characters or enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando tus personajes sufren {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efectos negativos{/g}, sus probabilidades de supervivencia se reducen, ya que reciben {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalizaciones{/g} a sus características, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} o acciones.
Cuando un personaje está sujeto a cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}, aparece el icono correspondiente junto a su retrato.

languages.text:
ネガティブ効果を受けていると、キャラクターの生存率が下がる。キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}、行動に{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受け、さらに毎{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受けることもある。
キャラクターが何かしら効果を受けると、対応するアイコンが対象キャラのイラストの横に表示される。
ネガティブ効果は、通常タイプと特殊タイプ、大きくふたつのカテゴリーに分けられる。通常のネガティブ効果として挙げられるのは、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ（速度低下）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}超能力減衰{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}攻撃不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}など。
他のネガティブ効果は全て特殊タイプと考えられていて、通常、出会うことはほぼない。この特殊効果は一般的に、キャラクターや敵の特定の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で発動する。
languages.original_text:
Under the influence of negative effects, your character's chances of survival are reduced: they receive {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, or actions, and may also suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
When a character is subject to any effect, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique. Common negative effects include: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}, psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
All other negative effects are considered unique — they are not nearly as commonly encountered. These unique effects are generally applied by specific {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} of characters or enemies.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}マイナス効果{/g}の影響下にある時、キャラクターが生存する確率は下がり、能力、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}、あるいはアクションに対する{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}が付与される。
キャラクターが何らかの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}の影響下におかれると、対応するアイコンがポートレイトの隣に表示される。

languages.text:
Olumsuz etkilere uğrayan karakterinin sağ kalma olasılığı düşer. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Nitelik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}yetenek{/g} veya eylemlerine {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alır. Ayrıca her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasara{/g} maruz kalabilir.
Bir karakter herhangi bir etkiye maruz kaldığında, portresinin yanında o etkiye ait simge belirir.
Olumsuz etkilerin iki ana kategorisi bulunur: Yaygın ve eşsiz. Yaygın olumsuz etkiler şunlardır: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Yanma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}yorgunluk{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}kaygı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}ruhsezi körelmesi{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}saldıramama{/g}, ruhsezi {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travması{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g}.
Diğer tüm olumsuz etkiler eşsiz olarak kabul edilirler. Yukarıdakiler kadar yaygın rastlanılmazlar. Bu eşsiz etkiler, genellikle karakter veya düşmanların belirli birtakım {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerince{/g} uygulanırlar.
languages.original_text:

When a character is subject to any effect, a corresponding icon will appear next to their portrait.
There are two broad categories of negative effects: common and unique. Common negative effects include: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}, psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
